allow: Bash(do sed 's/: React.FormEvent.*//g; s/: React.ReactNode.*//g; s/interface.*{/\/\/ &/g; s/^}$/\/\/ }/g; s/: any//g; s/: string//g; s/: boolean//g; s/import.*IBlog.*//g; s/import.*IComment.*//g' "$file")
Bash(for file in app/auth/*/*.tsx app/blogs/*/*.tsx app/blogs/*/edit/*.tsx)
Bash(do sed 's/: React.FormEvent.*//g; s/: React.ReactNode.*//g; s/interface.*{/\/\/ &/g; s/: any//g; s/: string//g; s/: boolean//g; s/import.*IBlog.*//g' "$file")
